entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: ENE 71 km/h gust 90 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
